title: Barbarian Quest - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Psychological
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Arrogant Characters   Brotherhood   Clever Protagonist   Death   Discrimination   Folklore   Friendship   Gladiators   Handsome Male Lead   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Knights   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Mercenaries   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Philosophical   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Religions   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   S*x S*aves   S*aves   Tribal Society   Wealthy Characters
author: BaekSoo KwiJok   백수귀족
description:
The Sky Mountain Range was a resting place for souls, and the living were not allowed to cross it.
Everyone believed it as such.

'You will become a great warrior, Urich.'

Urich, the tribe's strongest warrior, turned his back on his home and ventured into the civilized world.>
